title: Xamarin Forms Draw Image from platforms resources respective folders - android, ios
body:
Hi there,

Just quick question, I have a Xamarin Forms app and I am using SkiaSharp. I want to be able to draw an icon in my forms project using a icon in my respective drawable folders from my android project and resources in iOS project

What would the implementation look like for this in the Forms project? 

I was also looking into the sample project and it looks like a media folder is created and images placed in there but i am hoping to use the icons in my platforms respective resource folders.
